name: Among The Leaves
description:
Controls

WASD to move

Mouse to Aim and Left click to swing Sword

Space bar to dash

Tab to zoom out and M to toggle mute

Escape to Quit

Out playing at the gazebo, your mum has called you in for dinner. 

Face off against three unique boss monsters which are manifestations of your childhood fears and a variety of their minions as you attempt to reach the safety of your home.

Bathroom Spider Boss Slows you down with cobwebs! Hatches babies to attack! Springs to a new position mid fight!

Schoolyard Bully Throws a sucker punch! Kicks a football at you! Taunts you!

Monster Under the Bed Blinds you with fear! Throws deadly shadows! Knocks you away so you don’t get close!

Beetle Warrior A noble guardian of the backyard, will attack you with melee!

Worm Will charge at you dealing massive damage if they hit!

Gnomes The gnomes have come to life, shooting deadly magic at you!

Created by:

Jack Chateau-Loney - Twitter: @JackCL

Andre da Costa - https://andredcwork.wixsite.com/portfolio

Siril Sunny - Twitter: @SirilSunny

Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2020

Audio from:

https://beepyeah.itch.io/8-bit-sfx-pack

https://outspacer.itch.io/platformer-sfx
